spell1.spellDescription: Projects a powerful light beam that damages and BLINDS targets.
spell1.spellShortDescription: Beemo projects a powerful light beam that damages (40 + low Power Damage) and BLINDS (2.5 sec.) targets.

spell2.spellDescription: Beemo blasts enemies with a ring of video game energy that explodes in a huge burst of damage and STUNS.
spell2.spellShortDescription: Beemo creates a ring of video game energy that increases his armor (+20%) and shields (+50%) while periodically blasting enemies in its area (10 + low Power Damage / sec).  When the power ends, a huge burst STUNS (1 sec.) opponents in the area and does additional damage based on how long the power was running.  Beemo can hit W to end the power early.

spell3.spellDescription: Beemo unleashes a huge, slow-moving bee that will crush opponents in its path. Can hit multiple targets.
spell3.spellShortDescription: Beemo unleashes the Bouncy Bee: a huge, slow-moving projectile that will crush opponents in its path. Can hit multiple targets, doing (150 + medium Power Damage) to the first enemy and 30% less to each subsequent target hit.

spell4.spellDescription: After using 3 Powers, Beemo's next Power SLOWS.
spell4.spellShortDescription: After using 3 Powers, Beemo's next Power SLOWS (50% for 2.5 sec.)  any enemies hit.

spell1.spellDescription: Boosts armor and attack speed. If Finn reaches max Fury, armor explodes, doing damage.
spell1.spellShortDescription: Finn creates a shield that boosts his Armor (25%) and Attack Speed (20%). If Finn reaches max Fury while Armored Fury is active, the shield explodes, doing damage (50 + medium Power Damage).  The shield also explodes if Finn is KO'ed while it is active.

spell2.spellDescription: Finn dashes forward and slashes nearby enemies.  Adds Fury.  Refreshes on a KO or Assist.
spell2.spellShortDescription: Finn dashes forward and slashes enemies in his path (75 + low Power Damage).  Bombastic Dash adds Fury and its cooldown refreshes on a KO or Assist.

spell3.spellDescription: Drops 4 sword walls around Finn. ROOTS and damages the first enemy to touch each wall.
spell3.spellShortDescription: Finn drops 4 sword walls creating a fighting ring around himself. ROOTS (2 sec.) and damages (65 + low Power Damage) the first enemy to touch each wall.

spell4.spellDescription: Finn harnesses the complex emotions of a human boy! Hitting the same enemy multiple times increases Finn's damage by 20% up to 3 times.
spell4.spellShortDescription: Finn harnesses the complex emotions of a human boy! Hitting the same enemy multiple times with Basic Attacks (or Bombastic Dash) will increase Finn's damage to that enemy by 20% up to 3 times (for a total of 160% damage).  Hitting a different enemy will reset Finn's Fury

playerData.playerDescription: A heroic human boy with a heart of gold.

basicAttack.attackDescription: Finn attacks with whatever weapon he has at hand.

spell1.spellDescription: Dash forward and slash. Can be used 3 times, with the final slash hitting a large area and SLOWING enemies.
spell1.spellShortDescription: Fionna dashes forward and slashes enemies. Blade Rush can be used 3 times in succession before going on cooldown.  Each dash can be in a different direction;  the first two do damage (20 + low Power Damage) in a small area, while the final slash hits a larger area and SLOWS (50% for 1 sec.) enemies.  If Fioona doesn't hit anything with any of the dashes, her Blade Rush cooldown is reduced by 30%.

spell2.spellDescription: TOGGLE.  Fierce:  Drains health to boost move and attack speed.  / Fearless: Slowly heals. Bonus armor and shield.
spell2.spellShortDescription: Fionna can TOGGLE between Fierce and Fearless.  Fierce slowly drains Fionna's health (2%/sec., can't go below 1) to boost Move Speed (15%) and Attack Speed (20%).   Fearless slowly heals (1%/sec.) Fionna while granting bonus Armor (30%) and Shields (30%).

spell3.spellDescription: For 6 seconds, Fionna cannot go below 1 health.
spell3.spellShortDescription: For 6 seconds, Fionna cannot be KO'ed.   She can still take damage and suffer other effects (BLIND, STUN, etc.) but can not go below 1 health.

spell4.spellDescription: Fionna does more Attack Damage and Power Damage as her health drops.
spell4.spellShortDescription: Fionna does more Attack Damage and Power Damage as her health drops. The less health she has, the more damage she does; up to an 80% bonus when at 1% max health.  Tenacious bonus damage does not affect structures (Towers and Bases).

playerData.playerDescription: A figment of Ice King's imagination.

basicAttack.attackDescription: Fionna attacks with whatever weapon she has at hand.

spell1.spellDescription: Flame Princess throws a fiery projectile that, on hit, bursts into a fan of flames.
spell1.spellShortDescription: Flame Princess throws a fiery projectile that does (25 + medium Power Damage) damage on hit and bursts into a fan of flames behind the target, doing 120% of the initial damage to enemies in the area.

spell2.spellDescription: Morphs Champions into Flambits, which can damage their nearby allies.
spell2.spellShortDescription: Flame Princess calls down fire onto a targeted area, damaging  (50 + low Power Damage) any enemies caught in the blast.  Enemy Champions hit are MORPHED (3 sec.) into Flambits.  Flambits can't attack or use powers and are SLOWED (15% for 3 sec.), but can still move around and will damage (50 + low Power Damage / sec.) their nearby allies.

spell3.spellDescription: FP goes into Flame Mode, damaging nearby foes. Can dash up to 3 times.
spell3.spellShortDescription: Flame Princess transfoms into a Blazing Inferno doing massive damage (75 + medium Power Damage / sec.) to nearby foes. In this form, she can move, attack and use other powers and can also Dash up to 3 times by pressing E again. Blazing Inferno will last 5 seconds or until the 3rd Dash is used, whichever comes first.

spell4.spellDescription: After FP uses a Power, her next basic attack sets opponents on fire.
spell4.spellShortDescription: After Flame Princess uses a Power, her next basic attack will set her opponent on fire (20 + low Power Damage / sec.) for a short time (3 sec.).

playerData.playerDescription: The chaotic ruler of the Fire Kingdom.

basicAttack.attackDescription: Flame Princess hurls a ball of fire.

spell1.spellDescription: Gunter belly-slides forward, then fires a burst of bottles at nearby enemies.
spell1.spellShortDescription: Gunter dashes to a targeted location with Belly Slide, ignoring any obstacles and exploding in a burst of bottles at his destination,  damaging (50 + medium Power Damage) nearby enemies.

spell2.spellDescription: Gunter lets loose a gigantic bottle. Can trigger Shatter (passive).
spell2.spellShortDescription: Gunter hurls a gigantic bottle projectile which will damage (50 + high Power Damage) the first enemy it hits. If Wing It lands a knock-out blow it will trigger Shatter (Gunter's passive).

spell3.spellDescription: Gunter unleashes a steady onslaught of bottles.
spell3.spellShortDescription: Gunter unleashes a steady onslaught of bottles, doing (40 + high Power Damage / sec) to all enemies in a large area.  Gunter is unable to move or perform any ther actions while in this bottle-throwing frenzy.

spell4.spellDescription: If Gunter KOs an opponent with a basic attack or Wing It, a glass storm damages nearby foes.
spell4.spellShortDescription: If Gunter KOs an opponent with a basic attack or Wing It, a shower of broken glass damages (20 + low Power Damage) nearby foes.

playerData.playerDescriptionShort: The most evil thing in Ooo.

spell1.spellDescription: Ice King fires chilling ice shards that ROOT an enemy and damage them over time.
spell1.spellShortDescription: Ice King fires an icy projectile that will damage (10 + low Power Damage) the first enemy it hits and encase them  in chilling ice shards that ROOT (1.75 sec.) and damage (10 + low Power Damage/sec.) them over time.

spell2.spellDescription: With a flap of his beard, Ice King summons gigantic hailstones on the targeted area, damaging foes.
spell2.spellShortDescription: With a flap of his beard, Ice King bombards an area with gigantic hailstones, damaging (10 + low Power Damage/sec) any foes caught in the targeted area.

spell3.spellDescription: Ice King creates a large ice patch that damages enemies and boosts Ice King's speed.
spell3.spellShortDescription: Ice King creates a huge ice patch that damages (15 + low Power Damage/sec)  enemies caught in the area, and boosts Ice King's speed (100%).

spell4.spellDescription: When active, the next Champion to attack Ice King will move and attack SLOWER.
spell4.spellShortDescription: After 10 seconds of not using a Power, Ice King will create an Ice Shield around himself.  When active, the next Champion to attack Ice King will break the Ice Shield.  If the Ice Shield is broken by a Basic Attack, the attacker will be SLOWED (25% for 2 sec.) and suffer an Attack Speed penalty (33% for 2 sec.).

playerData.playerDescription: The king of ice and snow, aka Simon Petrikov.

basicAttack.attackDescription: Ice King zaps enemies with the freezing power of ice!

spell1.spellDescription: Jake STUNS an enemy and pulls in close to them, setting himself up for another melee attack.
spell1.spellShortDescription: Jake extends his arms to incredible lengths with his Stretchy Grab, damaging (25 + medium Power Damage) and STUNNING (2 sec.) the first enemy he hits.  He will then rapidly pull himself to that enemy, ignoring intervening obstacles and setting himself up for another attack.

spell2.spellDescription: Jake stretches into a ball, KNOCKING BACK and damaging all nearby foes.
spell2.spellShortDescription: Jake inflates himself into the form of a huge ball, KNOCKING BACK and damaging (65 + medium Power Damage) all nearby foes.

spell3.spellDescription: Jake grows HUGE and stomps on enemies.
spell3.spellShortDescription: Jake grows HUGE and stomps around for 5 seconds, damaging (60 + medium Power Damage/sec.) nearby foes when he moves.  While in Giant Jake form, Jake cannot make Basic Attacks or use other Powers, but he is immune to controling effects (except KNOCKBACK) and will remove any existing ROOTS or SLOWS when the power is activated.

spell4.spellDescription: Basic attacks slow opponents for a brief time and do bonus ATTACK DAMAGE. This can only happen once every 8 seconds.
spell4.spellShortDescription: Jake's Basic Attacks SLOWS (40% for 2 sec.) opponents and do bonus Attack Damage (+15%). This can only happen once every 8 seconds to a given target.

basicAttack.attackDescription: A clobbering punch from Jake's stretchy hand.

spell1.spellDescription: Lemongrab's blade damages and SLOWS opponents in a cone of pure sound.
spell1.spellShortDescription: Lemongrab's magical Sound Sword emits a cone of pure noise which damages (40 + low Power Damage) and SLOWS (50% for 2.5 sec.) opponents.

spell2.spellDescription: Lemongrab drops the Lemon Bomb! Damages, BLINDS, and SILENCES foes in target area.
spell2.spellShortDescription: Lemongrab drops the Lemon Bomb! After a brief delay, a massive lemon drops on the targeted area.  Foes caught in the outer ring are Damaged (60 + low Power Damage) and BLINDED (4 sec.).  Any enemy unlucky enough to get caught in the center ring take Damage (90 + low Power Damage), are BLINDED (4 sec.) and are also SILENCED (1 sec.).

spell3.spellDescription: Lemongrab summons dungeon cells that damage and STUN multiple enemies. Damage based on level of Unacceptable (passive).
spell3.spellShortDescription: Lemongrab summons Lemon Dungeon Cells that damage (100 + low Power Damage) enemies in the target area.  Enemy Champions caught in the area are also STUNNED (2 sec.).  Damage and duration of DUNGEON! is increased by 10% times Lemongrab's current level of UNACCEPTABLE! (passive).

spell4.spellDescription: When Lemongrab is hit by a Power, it increases the damage and STUN time of DUNGEON!
spell4.spellShortDescription: When Lemongrab is hit by an enemy Champion Power, he gains a level of UNACCEPTABLE!.  Each level decreases cast time and increases the damage and STUN time of DUNGEON! by 10%.  Lemongrab can only gain a level of UNACCEPTABLE! every 2 seconds and will lose a level after 6 seconds of not being hit by a Power.

playerData.playerDescription: The unstable ruler of the Earldom of Lemongrab.

spell1.spellDescription: The Lich leaves an unholy trail that damages and SLOWS. Enemies KO'd in the trail permanently increase Lich's Power Damage by 1.
spell1.spellShortDescription: The Lich leaves an unholy trail that damages (20 + low Power Damage/sec.) and SLOWS (30% for 1.5 sec.) any enemies that get caught in the affected area. Enemies KO'd by the trail permanently increase Lich's Power Damage by 1.

spell2.spellDescription: The Lich sends out a ball of dark magic that damages and CHARMS an enemy it encounters.
spell2.spellShortDescription: The Lich sends out a ball of dark magic that damages (40 + medium Power Damage) and CHARMS (2 sec.) the first enemy it encounters.

spell3.spellDescription: The Lich conjures a Well of Power that damages enemies. Press E again to teleport into Well.
spell3.spellShortDescription: The Lich conjures a Well of Power that does extreme damage (50 + medium Power Damage/sec) to enemies caught in the area. Lich can press E again to teleport to the center of Well of Power.

spell4.spellDescription: The Lich summons Skully. Any enemies Skully defeats permanently increase Lich's Power Damage by 1.
spell4.spellShortDescription: When Undead Servant is ready, any Power used by Lich summons Skully. Skully will follow the Lich and attack his targets for a while (20 sec.).  Increasing Lich's Attack Damage will increase the damage Skully does.   Any enemies Skully defeats permanently increase Lich's Power Damage by 1.

playerData.playerDescription: The ultimate evil in the Land of Ooo.

spell1.spellDescription: LSP fires a lumpy beam blast that damages and FEARS enemies. Heals LSP based on My Lumps (passive).
spell1.spellShortDescription: LSP fires a lumpy beam blast that damages (10 + medium Power Damage) and FEARS (2 sec.) all enemies it hits. Buuuumps also heals LSP for a percentage of her current maximum health based on My Lumps (passive).

spell2.spellDescription: LSP forms a super hot damage cloud around her bod.
spell2.spellShortDescription: LSP forms a super hot cloud around her bod that moves with her and damages  (20 + medium Power Damage/sec.) enemies caught inside.

spell3.spellDescription: LSP throws her phone across the entire map. It hurts enemies, and heals allies in its path.
spell3.spellShortDescription: LSP winds up and throws her phone across the entire map. It hurts enemies and heals allies in its path (250 + medium Power Damage), the amount is  reduced by 30% on each subsequent target.

spell4.spellDescription: Basic attacks add Lumps (10 max). Used by Buuuumps to heal.
spell4.spellShortDescription: LSP's Basic Attacks add Lumps (10 max). Lumps are consumed by Buuuumps to heal 3% of her max health for each Lump she has accumulated, up to 30%.

basicAttack.attackDescription: LSP tosses a cloud of lumpy space stuff. Gross.

spell1.spellDescription: Magic Man releases 3 energy snakes that damage and SILENCE opponents.
spell1.spellShortDescription: Magic Man releases 3 energy snake projectiles that damage (30 + high Power Damage) and SILENCE (1 sec.) opponents.  Only 1 snake can damage any given enemy.

spell2.spellDescription: Magic Man teleports a short distance and goes STEALTH, leaving behind an explosive decoy.  Press W to detonate early.
spell2.spellShortDescription: Magic Man teleports to a target location and goes STEALTH (3 sec. or until revealed), leaving behind an decoy that will explode after a delay, doing damage (50 + medium Power Damage) to enemies nearby.  Magic Man can detonate the decoy early by pressing W again.

spell3.spellDescription: Magic man rolls in and explodes, doing bonus damage to enemies with higher health. SLOWS and reduces armor.
spell3.spellShortDescription: Magic man rolls to a target location, ignoring obstacles and explodes, doing damage based on the target's current health (35% + .1% per point of Power Damage),  reducing armor (30% for 3 sec.) and SLOWING (30% for 3 sec.) in a large area.

spell4.spellDescription: When Magic Man hits other Champions with a basic attack, he gets a speed boost.
spell4.spellShortDescription: When Magic Man hits other Champions with a Basic Attack, he gets a move speed (20%) boost.

playerData.playerDescription: He's a Magic Man, and he's a jerk.

spell1.spellDescription: Shockwave (vampire): Marceline sends out a shockwave projectile that SLOWS (15% for 1.5 sec.) and does damage (50 + high Power Damage/sec. for 3 sec.) over time. /  Dark Energy (beast):  Marceline fires a dark energy projectile that damages (50 + high Power Damage) and ROOTS (3 sec.) its target.
spell1.spellShortDescription: Projectile that SLOWS & damages over time. / Projectile that ROOTS.

spell2.spellDescription: Marcy summons a damaging blood mist aura that boosts her speed. /Marcy uses ATTACK DRAIN to steal the life force of an enemy, increasing her speed and healing herself. Her next attack does bonus damage.
spell2.spellShortDescription: Blood Mist (vampire):  Marcy summons a blood mist aura that damages (15 + medium Power Damage) nearby foes and boosts her speed (30% for 4.5 sec.).  /  Hunter (beast):  Marcy increases her speed (40% for 4.5 sec.) and empowers her next Basic Attack with bonus Attack Damage (+100%) and ATTACK DRAIN (100%) to steal the life force of an enemy.

spell3.spellDescription: Marcy enters Vampire form, damaging and CHARMING nearby foes. Her attack speed increases. / Marcy enters Beast mode, which damages and FEARS nearby foes, and clears negative status effects.
spell3.spellShortDescription: When Marcy transforms into Vampire form she damages (100 + medium Power Damage) and CHARMS (2 sec.) all nearby foes and her Attack Speed increases (100% for 3 sec.). / When Marcy transforms into Beast form, she damages  (100 + medium Power Damage) and FEARS (2 sec.) all nearby foes.  She also clears any negative status effects and is briefly immune to them (2 sec).

spell4.spellDescription: Every 3rd hit ATTACK DRAINS. / Health regenerates faster.
spell4.spellShortDescription: Vampire Bite (vampire):  Every 3rd hit ATTACK DRAINS (100%). / Regeneration (beast):  Health regenerates faster when out of combat.

spell1.spellDescription: A dense, minty fog that damages and BLINDS foes.
spell1.spellShortDescription: Peppermint Butler exudes a dense, minty fog for 5 seconds that damages (20 + low Power Damage/sec.) and BLINDS any foes in its area.

spell2.spellDescription: Peppermint Butler digs underground to quickly strike his target, dealing explosive damage and STUNNING nearby foes.
spell2.spellShortDescription: Peppermint Butler dives underground and quickly tunnels to his target location; exploding upward, he damages (50 + medium Power Damage) and STUNS (1.5 sec.) nearby foes.

spell3.spellDescription: Peppermint Butler uses dark magic to reveal hidden foes and becomes a feral fighting machine. He has Increased move speed, attack speed, and attack damage.
spell3.spellShortDescription: Peppermint Butler uses dark magic to REVEAL hidden foes and becomes a feral fighting machine for 7 seconds. He gains increased Move Speed (40%), Attack Speed (30%), and Attack Damage (30%).

spell4.spellDescription: Peppermint Butler can stand still for 2 seconds to go STEALTH. The power lasts until he moves, attacks, or takes damage.  He heals rapidly while STEALTHED.
spell4.spellShortDescription: Peppermint Butler can stand still for 2 seconds to go STEALTH. The power lasts until he moves, attacks, or takes damage.  He gains bonus healing  while STEALTHED (2%/sec.).

playerData.playerDescription: A science genius, and the ruler of the Candy Kingdom.
playerData.playerDescriptionShort: She has science on her side!

basicAttack.attackDescription: Bubblegum is armed with a candy-powered pistol.

spell1.spellDescription: PB creates a scientific puddle that does damage, SLOWS foes, and gives her a speed boost.
spell1.spellShortDescription: PB lobs a scientific potion at a target location, creating a puddle that does damage (5 + medium Power Damage/sec.) and SLOWS (30% for 2 sec.) foes in the area.  Entering the area gives PB a Move Speed (40% for 2 sec.) boost.  The puddle lasts for 3 seconds.

spell2.spellDescription: PB drops candy-powered turrets (2 max) that blast enemies (prioritizes Champions).
spell2.spellShortDescription: PB drops candy-powered turrets (2 max) that blasts enemies (10 + Attack Damage/shot), prioritizing enemy Champions.  Each Candy Turret lasts for 30 seconds or until it is destroyed or PB is KO'ed.  Candy Turret damage and health scale with PB's.

spell3.spellDescription: Bubblegum sets off an explosive blast that damages and KNOCKS BACK enemies.
spell3.spellShortDescription: PB plants a bomb that she can trigger by pressing E again or will explode on its own after 4 seconds.   When set off, an explosive blast will damage (125 + high Power Damage) and KNOCKBACK enemies away from the bomb.  If PB is in the area, the KNOCKBACK will also affect her.

spell4.spellDescription: PB's basic attacks gum up enemies, causing them to attack slower.
spell4.spellShortDescription: PB's Basic Attacks gum up enemies, causing them to attack slower (12.5% for 3 sec.). This effect can stack up to 4 times (for a 50% total reduction in Attack Speed)

spell1.spellDescription: Rattleballs dashes into counter-stance. He counters the next attack with a CRIT hit. If not attacked, he damages nearby foes OR press Q again to dash, instead.
spell1.spellShortDescription: Rattleballs dashes into Counter Stance.  In Counter Stance, one of three things can happen:  1. If hit by a Basic Attack he will Counter Attack, taking no damage and dealing a Crit Attack to his attacker.  2:  If not attacked for 1.5 seconds, he will Spin Attack (75 + medium Power Damage) nearby foes.  3:  Press Q again to Dash Attack damaging (50 + medium Power Damage) foes in his path.

spell2.spellDescription: Rattleballs' awesome sword powers deal damage and pull opponents toward him.
spell2.spellShortDescription: Rattleballs' awesome sword powers deal damage (75 + medium Power Damage) in a large area and PULLS any opponents in range toward him.

spell3.spellDescription: Rattleballs pulls a sweet spin move that damages all nearby foes. Press E again to cancel.
spell3.spellShortDescription: Rattleballs pulls a sweet blade spinning move that repeatedly damages all nearby foes (75 + high Power Damage/sec.) and gaining a small increase to his own movement while active (10% for 3.5 sec.). He can press E again to cancel the power, returning his move speed to normal.

spell4.spellDescription: After using a Power, Rattleballs' next 2 basic attacks heal him for a percentage of the damage.
spell4.spellShortDescription: For 3 seconds after using a Power, Rattleballs' next 2 Basic Attacks will heal him for 50% percentage of the damage he deals.

playerData.playerDescription: The shadowy protecter of the Candy Kingdom.

belt.name: Bella Noche's Knapsack
belt.description: PROs: Shields. Health. CONs: Power Damage.
belt.description_short: Anti-magic gear is the name of the game!  Watch out for time traveling girlfriends!

belt.name: Billy's Bag
belt.description: PROs: Breach. Speed. Crit.   CONs: Power Damage.  Armor.
belt.description_short: Diversify your fighting abilities and become the hero you are meant to be!

belt.name: Candy Monarch Regalia
belt.description: PROs: Cooldown. Breach. Speed. CONs: Attack Range. Shields.
belt.description_short: Speed and flexibility give you the tools you need to control the battlefield.

belt.name: Champion's Backpack
belt.description: PROs:  Great Basic Stats.  CONs: No Alternate Stats.
belt.description_short: A mighty champion's basic bag of battle junk.  Good for any situation.

belt.name: Enchanted Ensemble
belt.description: PROs: Massive Defenses. CONs: Tradeoffs. Speed. Damage.
belt.description_short: Enchanted items provide you with great power ... with a little bit of a tradeoff.

belt.name: Fridjitsu: Ninjas of the Ice
belt.description: PROs: Speed. Crits. Cooldowns. CONs: Damage. Defensive tradeoffs.
belt.description_short: Critically strike your foes! Run, attack and cast faster.  Strong defenses too, but they can slow you down. Choose wisely.

belt.name: Ice Monarch Regalia
belt.description: PROs: Power Damage. Power Vamp.  CONs: Attack Damage. Health. Shields.
belt.description_short: Unleash your icy magic and freeze your foes' very souls!

belt.name: Meta-Science Sack
belt.description: PROs: Cooldown. Power Vamp. "Monster Slayer". CONs: Power Damage. Shields.
belt.description_short: A scientific approach to dealing with any situation.  If you can't beat 'em, change the rules!

belt.name: Techno-Tank
belt.description: PROs: Multiple Defensive Stats.  CONs: Attack Damage. Spread out stats.
belt.description_short: Become a veritable tank with these technological wonders!

belt.name: Nearly Ultimate Wizard Wear
belt.description: PROs: Power Damage. Power utility. CONs: Attack Damage. Shields. Health.
belt.description_short: Master the ways of magic to become the (nearly) Ultimate Wizard!

belt.name: Vampire Rocker Gear
belt.description: PROs: Attack Vamp. Power Vamp.  CONs:  Attack Damage. Power Damage.
belt.description_short: Drain your foes, live forever and rock their world with these Abadeer family heirlooms!

junk.name: Ax Bass
junk.description: This sweet ax is an Abadeer family heirloom

junk.name: Candy Cane Shotgun
junk.description: Sacrifices some basic attack range but packs quite a punch!

junk.name: Demon Blood Sword
junk.description: An enchanted blade capable of destroying Kee'Oth (and other monsters). What more do you want?

junk.name: Eyeball Whip
junk.description: Lash your foes with this whip of eyeballs.  Eyes all in a line .. like an eye queue?

junk.name: Finn's Golden Sword
junk.description: A mighty sword, made for attacking your foes!

junk.name: Jake's Mace
junk.description: Jake's mace is good for keeping you healthy and discouraging bad guys

junk.name: Magic Nail
junk.description: Turns anything into a weapon, fixes stuff.  The more you fight, the deadlier you become.

junk.name: MeMow's Dagger
junk.description: The quick and deadly dagger of the legendary assassin.

junk.name: Nothung
junk.description: Billy's legendary sword

junk.name: Numb-Chucks
junk.description: Move fast like a Ninja and slow your foes with numbing blows

junk.name: Anti-anti-magic Potion
junk.description: Magic brew of potent magic mojo is actually powerful anti-magic, but reversed.  Just drink it!

junk.name: Demonic Wishing Eye
junk.description: Potent offensive and life sustaining magics with a patented "+5% crit chance"

junk.name: Electrode Gun
junk.description: Princess Bubblegum created this tasty bit of technology to rapidly ZAP her foes!

junk.name: The Gauntlet of the Hero
junk.description: This gauntlet lets you penetrate magical defenses.  Legend has it that this is the only item able to harm The Lich.

junk.name: Magic Wand
junk.description: A compact and potent magic wand

junk.name: Marceline's Amp
junk.description: Blasting magical music that syphons your soul, or at least any red in it.

junk.name: Simon Petrikov's Glasses
junk.description: Glasses of the brilliant scientist and eventual wizard, Simon Petrikov.

junk.name: Billy's Loincloth
junk.description: Armor yourself in the most basic gear of the most legendary hero!

junk.name: Crystal Gem Apple
junk.description: Ultimate Crystal Power! Crystaline body and death-ray eyes, all wrapped up in this tasty package.

junk.name: Ice Armor
junk.description: Super thick ice makes you incredibly hard to wound, but attack slower

junk.name: Jake's Helm
junk.description: A durable protective device for your head.

junk.name: Robo Suit
junk.description: A tough, resistant robotic suit of armor.

junk.name: Anti-Magic Cube
junk.description: Nulifies magic, even your own

junk.name: Bubblegum's T-Shirt
junk.description: T-Shirt gifted to the Candy Kingdom Monarch from the Vampire Queen of Rock

junk.name: Grob Gob Glob Grod's Device
junk.description: This Martian device does many things including draining magic juices.

junk.name: Ice King's Crown
junk.description: An evil magical crown that will protect its wearer with frost and grant them magical powers.

junk.name: Wizard's Cloak
junk.description: A shiny magic resistant cloak.

junk.name: Wizard Robe
junk.description: The robe of the Nearly Ultimate Wizard.  Just 1 star missing!

junk.name: Anti-gravity Tote Chamber
junk.description: This miraculous device is used to safely store the most perfect of snacks.

junk.name: The Art of Fridjitsu
junk.description: Teaches one the Art of Fridjitsu: Ninjas of the Ice.

junk.name: Bacon Pancakes
junk.description: Delicious bacon pancakes

junk.name: Googoomamameter
junk.description: A device that gauges the amount of "witchery" in an area

junk.name: Ghost Pouch
junk.description: A pouch with a trapped spirit.  Good for your health, better with spells.

junk.name: Nightosphere Amulet
junk.description: Amulet worn by rulers of the Nightosphere.

junk.name: The Enchiridion
junk.description: Teaches one the Art of being a Hero!
